articles.description: There’s every chance Miomir Kecmanovic would be back home in Serbia had Novak Djokovic been allowed to stay.
articles.content:
Miomir Kecmanovic has vowed to avenge his countryman Novak Djokovic, but the Serbian youngster has also made the most of the tennis champions absence.
